Class MultiProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • Function
      • MultiProduct

  • public class MultiProduct
extends Function
    A class that represents a function that is the product of multiple functions. Inherits from the Function abstract class.

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Function[] functions

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiProduct

        public MultiProduct​(Function f,
                    Function g,
                    Function... args)
        Constructs a MultiProduct object with the given functions. The product is computed as f * g * args[0] * args[1] * ...
        Parameters:
        f - The first function
        g - The second function
        args - Additional functions

      • splitDerivative

        public MultiSum splitDerivative​(Function[] derivatives)
        Splits the derivatives of the MultiProduct into a MultiSum.
        Parameters:
        derivatives - An array of derivative functions
        Returns:
        A MultiSum object representing the sum of the derivatives functions
